name: Breakthrough San Francisco
description: Breakthrough supports young people in San Francisco on the path to college, and trains outstanding college students for education careers.
fullDescription: Breakthrough supports young people in San Francisco on the path to college, and trains outstanding college students for education careers.
whatTheyOffer: Breakthrough provides intensive academic enrichment and support to motivated San Francisco students with limited educational opportunities. Breakthrough is an 8-year program. You can apply as fourth graders at public elementary schools in San Francisco. For four years, during the summers prior to 5-8th grade, students attend an intensive six-week summer program. Each day, they take four hours of challenging classes in math, science, literature, and writing, and complete an hour of homework night
